name: Softball WBSC
description:
From first timers to more experimented players, Softball WBSC makes the most beloved sport available for everyone. Will you become the ultimate champion and win all tournaments?

Fun and easy to play!
-Fast softball action with easy to learn controls.
-Casual fun with real batting and pitching mechanics.


Think fast, play smart!
-Quick decisions matter. React and take control of the game.
-Manually control your fielders or let the AI do the job.


Build your own team.

-Recruit more and better players.
-Raise your team level and become the best of the best.


Play as your favorite country!
-Choose from the official World Baseball Softball Confederation teams.
-Take your country to the top.


Hit a home run!
-Feel the excitement of taking the ball out of the field!
-This and more action awaits, what are you waiting for?
